content: Predict the Score of NBA Finals GamesThe rules of this contest are simple: Predict the score of each team for game 1 of the NBA Finals.For example, if your guess isNuggets 112-115 HeatAnd the actually score isNuggets 114-109 HeatWe add the total you are off on the Nuggets (2) to the total you are off on the Heat (6) and get your total differential (. The 3 players with the lowest differential win our prizes.1st - $1002nd - $603rd - $40This will repeat for each finals match, until an NBA champion is crowned.*Any player who gets first place more than once will receive an additional $100 prize for each subsequent victory!*How to EnterEntry is free for any player placing a wager of at least $5 on an NBA finals market with odds of at least 1.77 (-130 American).Once you have placed your bet, comment on the original article at Betcoin.ag (see link below) with the game number, your score prediction and qualifying betslip ID.https://www.betcoin.ag/betcoinag-2000-nba-finals-prediction-collision-new-contest-every-matchExample: Game 1- Nuggets 114-109 Heat - X487HYB23Entries posted after tipoff will be disqualified and deleted.Players can enter one time per NBA Finals match.If 2 players have the same differential, ties will be broken by adding individual team score predictions and comparing to the total score of the match. Additional ties will be closest total score, without going over. Further ties will have prizes split accordingly. In order to qualify for a $100 bonus for winning multiple times, you must win outright, without splitting a prize for a tie.Limit 1 account per household. All management decisions are final.Thank you and best of luck to all!
